title: Ashli Babbit，美國國會大廈內被槍殺，曾在美國空軍服役4次，是一名愛國者

replies.msg:
KUSI News confirms identity of woman shot and killed inside US Capitol

https://youtu.be/mWxq84olsV4

WASHINGTON (KUSI) — The woman who was shot and killed inside the US Capitol during the protests was from the San Diego area.

KUSI News has spoken with her husband.

The woman is, a 14-year veteran, who served four tours with the US Air Force, and was a high level security official throughout her time in service.

Her husband says she was a strong supporter of President Trump, and was a great patriot to all who knew her.

The Metropolitan Police Department says an investigation into her death continues.

KUSI sends our condolences to her family and all who knew her.

replies.msg:
救命，愛侵還愛侵唔該都FC下先..咪做豬隊友

（謠言）
另一名站在Jake旁邊的男性，其左手的刺青被放大，並傳言與ANTIFA相關的標誌。

Lin Wood更是發推表示由於圖片中的人和來自於ANTIFA網站Phillyantifa，斷言他們是ANTIFA，

（闢謠）
實際上：
- 這個標誌是Outside’s Mark2012年出品的一款名為Dishonored的遊戲。https://dishonored.fandom.com/wiki/Outsider%27s_Mark

- 這名男性名為Jason Tankersley，來自Maryland，37歲是當地Maryland Skinheads極端組織的建立者。PhillyAntifa網站把他的照片公布出來是在其需要注意的「種族主義者」名單之中。Lin Wood還有其他人竟然以此為證據⋯
參考：https://phillyantifa.org/page/2/

quote.msg:
KUSI News confirms identity of woman shot and killed inside US Capitol

https://youtu.be/mWxq84olsV4

WASHINGTON (KUSI) — The woman who was shot and killed inside the US Capitol during the protests was from the San Diego area.

KUSI News has spoken with her husband.

The woman is, a 14-year veteran, who served four tours with the US Air Force, and was a high level security official throughout her time in service.

Her husband says she was a strong supporter of President Trump, and was a great patriot to all who knew her.

The Metropolitan Police Department says an investigation into her death continues.

KUSI sends our condolences to her family and all who knew her.

（謠言）
另一名站在Jake旁邊的男性，其左手的刺青被放大，並傳言與ANTIFA相關的標誌。

Lin Wood更是發推表示由於圖片中的人和來自於ANTIFA網站Phillyantifa，斷言他們是ANTIFA，

（闢謠）
實際上：
- 這個標誌是Outside’s Mark2012年出品的一款名為Dishonored的遊戲。https://dishonored.fandom.com/wiki/Outsider%27s_Mark

- 這名男性名為Jason Tankersley，來自Maryland，37歲是當地Maryland Skinheads極端組織的建立者。PhillyAntifa網站把他的照片公布出來是在其需要注意的「種族主義者」名單之中。Lin Wood還有其他人竟然以此為證據⋯
參考：https://phillyantifa.org/page/2/
